data.title: Indian 2’s Troll Fest Round 2 Begins!
data.meta_description: Indian 2's Troll Fest Round 2 Begins! - Indian-2 was a disaster during the time of its theatrical release, and many audiences who watched
data.text:
Kamal Haasan’s Indian-2, which was released on 12th July 2024 and has acquired mixed reviews from audiences and critics, is now streaming on Netflix today.

Also Read – Jailer Unlocked: A 3-Part Roar into the Making of Jailer!

Kamal Haasan’s Indian-2 was directed by Shankar and has a bunch of star-studded actors, which include Sidhharth, S. J. Suryah, and many others. The musical album of this movie was composed by Anirudh Ravichander, and this movie was produced by Lyca Productions.

Indian-2 was a disaster during the time of its theatrical release, and many audiences who watched the movie in theatres trolled it during the time of its release. Now the Indian-2 has been streaming on Netflix From Today (August 9th) and the audiences who missed the movie in theatres have watched it on Netflix, and they too started to troll the movie. This movie was the biggest disaster and was considered the worst film in Shankar’s filmography. Now the netizens and the meme creators were trending the Indian Thatha’s meme templates all over the social media and having a troll fest with Indian-2.

Also Read – Vikram’s Thangalaan 2 Is Ready to Take Off!

Kamal Haasan has previously mentioned before the release of the Indian Part 2 that he gives a nod because he likes Part 3 of this movie. Let us hope the Indian-3 will satisfy the audience’s expectations and become a hit.
